tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AI_Marketing_Campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audience_segment VARCHAR(255),
  targeted_group VARCHAR(255),
  campaign_type VARCHAR(50),
  campaign_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_type VARCHAR(20),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_targets (
    target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_segment_id INT,
    target_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_criteria TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (target_segment_id) REFERENCES audience_segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    target_id INT,
    result_metric VARCHAR(50),
    result_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES campaign_targets(target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES AudienceSegments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES AudienceSegments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    click_count INT,
    conversion_count INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE target_audience (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_id INT,
    audience_name VARCHAR(255),
    audience_age INT,
    audience_interests TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(segment_id) REFERENCES audience_segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_data (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audience_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY(audience_id) REFERENCES target_audience(audience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY(campaign_id) REFERENCES campaign_data(campaign_id)
);
